text: Niko Klanšek (born February 20, 1984) is a Slovenian entrepreneur, advisor and investor. In 2017, he became the president of Slovenian basketball club KD Slovan. == References == Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kranj Category:Slovenian businesspeople Category:Fordham University alumni Category:Harvard Business School people
title: Niko Klanšek
